channel.title: Shelters on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Shelters on ZooBerry

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Pack 2
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 2 with Easter-themed objects and animals.

item.title: Alpine Cat Climber
item.description: An Alpine Cat Climber for alpine-based cats.

item.title: Jungle Ruins Cat Climber
item.description: A Jungle Ruins Cat Climber for Tropical Rainforest cats.

item.title: Snowy Cat Climber
item.description: A snowy Cat Climber for snow-bound cats.

item.title: Bog Pack
item.description: A Bog Pack made by Hendrix with new animals, objects, and a new biome.

item.title: Japanese Macaque Pack
item.description: Japanese macaques range through the forested mountains and highlands of Japan.

item.title: Amur Leopard Mini Pack
item.description: The Amur leopard is one of nine recognised subspecies of leopard.

item.title: Eurasian Wolf Mini Pack
item.description: The Eurasian wolf, also known as the European, common or forest wolf, is a subspecies of grey wolf which has the largest range among wolf subspecies.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1
item.description: A pack containing various buildings, scenery and foliage imported from JPOG.

item.title: AVES
item.description: An expansive user-made expansion pack made by the ZT ABC Team!

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!

item.title: Biome Shelter Pack
item.description: Tired of shelters that just don’t match your beautifully crafted exhibits? Worry no more! This pack contains shelters created to complement your exhibits: Boreal Forest Rock Cave, Temperate Forest Rock Cave, Grassland Rock Cave, Savannah Rock Cave, Wetlands Rock Cave, Grassland burrows for Ratels, and a tropical fern Shade Structure.
